data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of An Giang, Vietnam.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of An Giang, Vietnam

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of An Giang, Vietnam.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 46,937 believers in An Giang.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of An Giang
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Father, 1.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Spirit, teach the church in the state of An Giang to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Father, help the 46,937 believers in An Giang to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.section_summary:
the state of An Giang, Vietnam has a population of 2,170,100.

We estimate An Giang has 46,937 people who might know Jesus, 174,069 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,949,094 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 46 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in An Giang, Vietnam to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 2,123,163 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood
